title: 点卷插件问题
author: Blood_Donors
txt_content:
我用Playerpoints插件在BOSSHOP里买点卷道具
出现了Playerpoints/CommandPoints was not found... You need one of that plugins if you want to work with Points Get PlayerPoints there：
http://dev.bukkit.org/server-mods-playerpoints

我点了网站去重新下载了插件，却还是不能使用，求解。

replies.author: Cynthia丶
replies.txt_content:
看我的签名档，
bossshop配置con的介绍
